description: This speedy Thai beef salad is ready in 15 minutes and uses only four ingredients. Make a speedy marinade and pair with a pre-made salad for a fast weeknight meal.
keywords: Thai beef salad,Oct 2020,High protein,Spring,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Beef
name: Speedy Spicy Thai Beef Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop half the chilli. Combine sauce, 2 tsp peanut oil and chopped chilli in a large shallow dish. Add steak and turn to coat.
Heat a greased chargrill pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook steak for 3 minutes on each side for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil. Rest for 5 minutes.
Place salad, reserving dressing and crispy onion, in a large bowl.
Slice steak and arrange over salad. Thinly slice remaining chilli. Scatter over chilli and reserved crispy onion, and pour over reserved dressing. Serve.
